description.zh-cn: 西汉第六位皇帝，与其父汉文帝的统治时期合称“文景之治”。他在位期间，削诸侯封地，平定七国之乱，巩固中央集权。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Western Han dynasty. His reign, together with that of his father Emperor Wen, is known as the 'Rule of Wen and Jing'. During his reign, he reduced the power of feudal lords, quelled the Rebellion of the Seven States, and consolidated central authority.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第五位皇帝，汉景帝刘启之父。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Western Han dynasty, father of Emperor Jing (Liu Qi).

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝的皇后，汉景帝刘启之母。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Wen and mother of Emperor Jing (Liu Qi).

description.zh-cn: 西汉景帝时期，吴王刘濞、楚王刘戊为首的七个刘姓宗室诸侯国因不满削藩政策而发动的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion during the reign of Emperor Jing of the Western Han dynasty, initiated by seven vassal states of the Liu clan, led by Liu Pi, the King of Wu, and Liu Wu, the King of Chu, in response to the policy of reducing the power of the vassal states.

description.zh-cn: 中国西汉汉文帝、汉景帝统治时期，推行“与民休息”的政策，是中国历史上第一个太平盛世。
description.en: A period during the reigns of Emperor Wen and Emperor Jing of the Western Han dynasty, characterized by policies of 'resting with the people', marking the first period of great peace and prosperity in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 西汉政治家，曾任御史大夫。他主张削藩，引发七国之乱，后被汉景帝处死。
description.en: A statesman of the Western Han dynasty who served as Grandee Secretary. He advocated for reducing the power of the vassal states, which triggered the Rebellion of the Seven States, and was later executed by Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 西汉吴王，七国之乱的主要发起者。
description.en: King of Wu during the Western Han dynasty and the main instigator of the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 西汉吴王刘濞的太子，因与当时的皇太子刘启（后来的汉景帝）下棋发生争执而被其打死。
description.en: Crown Prince of Liu Pi, the King of Wu. He was killed by the then Crown Prince Liu Qi (later Emperor Jing) during a dispute over a board game.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的军事家、将领，曾任太尉、丞相。成功平定七国之乱，后遭景帝猜忌下狱绝食而死。
description.en: A military strategist and general of the Western Han dynasty, who served as Grand Marshal and Chancellor. He successfully suppressed the Rebellion of the Seven States but was later imprisoned due to Emperor Jing's suspicion and died on a hunger strike.

description.zh-cn: 西汉外戚，窦太后侄，曾参与平定七国之乱。
description.en: A relative of the imperial family by marriage in the Western Han dynasty, nephew of Empress Dowager Dou. He participated in suppressing the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝长子，母栗姬。初为太子，后被废为临江王，最终被迫自杀。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Jing, his mother was Consort Li. Initially the crown prince, he was later demoted to King of Linjiang and ultimately forced to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝的妃嫔，皇长子刘荣的生母。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Jing and the mother of his eldest son, Liu Rong.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝的第二位皇后，汉武帝刘彻的生母。
description.en: The second empress of Emperor Jing and the mother of Emperor Wu (Liu Che).

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝，汉景帝之子。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty, son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 西汉楚王，与吴王刘濞一同发起七国之乱。
description.en: King of Chu during the Western Han dynasty, who, along with Liu Pi, King of Wu, initiated the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 西汉大臣，晁错的政敌，曾建议汉景帝诛杀晁错以平息七国之乱。
description.en: A minister of the Western Han dynasty and a political rival of Chao Cuo. He advised Emperor Jing to execute Chao Cuo to quell the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝的宠臣，后被汉景帝没收家产，最终饿死。
description.en: A favored courtier of Emperor Wen, whose property was confiscated by Emperor Jing, leading to his death from starvation.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的朝代，与东汉合称汉朝。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, which together with the Eastern Han is known as the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉开国皇帝，汉景帝之子长沙定王刘发的后裔。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty, a descendant of Liu Fa, King Ding of Changsha, who was a son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉开国皇帝，汉景帝之子中山靖王刘胜的后裔。
description.en: The founding emperor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, a descendant of Liu Sheng, King Jing of Zhongshan, who was a son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝之子，母唐姬，为东汉光武帝刘秀的祖先。
description.en: Son of Emperor Jing and Consort Tang, and an ancestor of Emperor Guangwu (Liu Xiu) of the Eastern Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝之子，母贾夫人，为三国时期蜀汉皇帝刘备的祖先。
description.en: Son of Emperor Jing and Lady Jia, and an ancestor of Liu Bei, emperor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝的妃嫔，长沙定王刘发的生母。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Jing and the mother of Liu Fa, King Ding of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝的妃嫔，赵敬肃王刘彭祖与中山靖王刘胜的生母。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Jing and the mother of Liu Pengzu, King Jingsu of Zhao, and Liu Sheng, King Jing of Zhongshan.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝的第一位皇后，后被废黜。
description.en: The first empress of Emperor Jing, who was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝刘启是汉文帝刘恒的长子。
description.en: Emperor Jing (Liu Qi) was the eldest son of Emperor Wen (Liu Heng).

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝刘启的母亲是汉文帝的窦皇后。
description.en: The mother of Emperor Jing (Liu Qi) was Empress Dou of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 窦皇后是汉文帝的皇后。
description.en: Empress Dou was the empress of Emperor Wen.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝与其父汉文帝的统治时期，因其勤俭治国、发展生产，被合称为“文景之治”。
description.en: The reign of Emperor Jing, along with that of his father Emperor Wen, is known as the 'Rule of Wen and Jing' due to their frugal governance and promotion of production.

description.zh-cn: 汉文帝与其子汉景帝的统治时期，因其勤俭治国、发展生产，被合称为“文景之治”。
description.en: The reign of Emperor Wen, along with that of his son Emperor Jing, is known as the 'Rule of Wen and Jing' due to their frugal governance and promotion of production.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝派遣太尉周亚夫、大将军窦婴等人成功平定了七国之乱。
description.en: Emperor Jing dispatched Grand Marshal Zhou Yafu and General-in-chief Dou Ying to successfully suppress the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 御史大夫晁错向汉景帝建议削藩，直接引发了七国之乱。
description.en: Grandee Secretary Chao Cuo's suggestion to Emperor Jing to reduce the power of the vassal states directly triggered the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 吴王刘濞是七国之乱的主要发起者和领导者。
description.en: Liu Pi, the King of Wu, was the main initiator and leader of the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 楚王刘戊与吴王刘濞一同领导了七国之乱。
description.en: Liu Wu, the King of Chu, co-led the Rebellion of the Seven States with Liu Pi, the King of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 在七国之乱爆发后，汉景帝为平息叛乱，采纳袁盎等人的建议，将晁错腰斩于东市。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Rebellion of the Seven States, Emperor Jing, in an attempt to quell the rebellion, adopted the advice of Yuan Ang and others and had Chao Cuo executed by waist-chop at the East Market.

description.zh-cn: 袁盎是晁错的政敌，他向汉景帝献策诛杀晁错以平叛乱。
description.en: Yuan Ang was a political rival of Chao Cuo and advised Emperor Jing to execute Chao Cuo to suppress the rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 刘启为太子时，因与吴国太子刘贤下棋发生争执，用棋盘打死了刘贤。
description.en: When Liu Qi was the crown prince, he killed Liu Xian, the Crown Prince of Wu, by striking him with a chessboard during a dispute over a game.

description.zh-cn: 刘贤是吴王刘濞的太子。
description.en: Liu Xian was the crown prince of Liu Pi, the King of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 因其子刘贤被太子刘启打死，吴王刘濞从此怨恨刘启和朝廷。
description.en: Because his son Liu Xian was killed by Crown Prince Liu Qi, Liu Pi, the King of Wu, harbored resentment towards Liu Qi and the imperial court.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝派太尉周亚夫领兵，在三个月内成功平定了七国之乱。
description.en: Emperor Jing dispatched Grand Marshal Zhou Yafu to lead troops, and he successfully suppressed the Rebellion of the Seven States within three months.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝派大将军窦婴与太尉周亚夫一同镇压七国之乱。
description.en: Emperor Jing dispatched General-in-chief Dou Ying along with Grand Marshal Zhou Yafu to suppress the Rebellion of the Seven States.

description.zh-cn: 平定七国之乱后，周亚夫因与汉景帝意见不合而遭猜忌，后被以谋反罪下狱，绝食而死。
description.en: After suppressing the Rebellion of the Seven States, Zhou Yafu was suspected by Emperor Jing due to disagreements, later imprisoned on charges of treason, and died on a hunger strike.

description.zh-cn: 前150年，汉景帝废黜太子刘荣，将其贬为临江王，后刘荣被以“侵占庙地”罪名逼迫自杀。
description.en: In 150 BCE, Emperor Jing deposed Crown Prince Liu Rong, demoting him to King of Linjiang. Liu Rong was later forced to commit suicide on the charge of 'encroaching on temple grounds'.

description.zh-cn: 刘荣是汉景帝的长子。
description.en: Liu Rong was the eldest son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 刘荣的生母是汉景帝的妃嫔栗姬。
description.en: Liu Rong's birth mother was Consort Li, a consort of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 栗姬是汉景帝的妃嫔。
description.en: Consort Li was a consort of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻是汉景帝的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Wu (Liu Che) was the son of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻的生母是汉景帝的王皇后。
description.en: The birth mother of Emperor Wu (Liu Che) was Empress Wang of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 前150年四月，汉景帝立王氏为皇后。
description.en: In the fourth month of 150 BCE, Emperor Jing installed Lady Wang as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 薄皇后是汉景帝的第一位皇后，于前151年被废。
description.en: Empress Bo was the first empress of Emperor Jing and was deposed in 151 BCE.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝因早年怨恨汉文帝的宠臣邓通，即位后将其家产全部没收，导致邓通最终饿死。
description.en: Emperor Jing, harboring resentment from his early years against Deng Tong, a favorite of Emperor Wen, confiscated all of Deng Tong's property after ascending the throne, leading to Deng Tong's death from starvation.

description.zh-cn: 邓通是汉文帝的宠臣，深受其信任和恩典。
description.en: Deng Tong was a favored courtier of Emperor Wen, deeply trusted and favored by him.

description.zh-cn: 周亚夫在汉景帝时期先后担任太尉（前154-前149）和丞相（前150-前147）。
description.en: Zhou Yafu served Emperor Jing successively as Grand Marshal (154-149 BCE) and Chancellor (150-147 BCE).

description.zh-cn: 晁错在汉景帝时期担任御史大夫。
description.en: Chao Cuo served as Grandee Secretary during the reign of Emperor Jing.

description.zh-cn: 长沙定王刘发是汉景帝的儿子，母唐姬。
description.en: Liu Fa, King Ding of Changsha, was the son of Emperor Jing and Consort Tang.

description.zh-cn: 东汉光武帝刘秀是长沙定王刘发的后裔。
description.en: Emperor Guangwu (Liu Xiu) of the Eastern Han was a descendant of Liu Fa, King Ding of Changsha.

description.zh-cn: 中山靖王刘胜是汉景帝的儿子，母贾夫人。
description.en: Liu Sheng, King Jing of Zhongshan, was the son of Emperor Jing and Lady Jia.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉昭烈帝刘备是中山靖王刘胜的后裔。
description.en: Emperor Zhaolie (Liu Bei) of Shu Han was a descendant of Liu Sheng, King Jing of Zhongshan.
